Comment: The government has nothing at all to do with accreditation of colleges and universities. Like they're not involved at all. This EO does nothing, it's just something to stir shit up in the media.  The president can issue an EO saying Harvard is no longer accredited, but he's not the one who makes that call - it's other universities. And no other university is going to refuse to accept transfer credits from Harvard, no companies will refuse to accept Harvard degrees as valid, no students will decide not to apply to Harvard.
